main event: A class of students in Orange, Connecticut, reported seeing a large, bright, flashing light in the sky on March 16, 1964.
interesting points: The light was described as very bright and flashing on and off,Class members thought it was larger and brighter than an airplane,The sighting lasted about 2-3 minutes before the light disappeared,The object was described to be very high in the sky,People were excited and wanted to know if there were other sightings reported.
sighted object: a large, bright, flashing light in the sky
witness description: students from a class going to a basketball game
